name: Lost in Prime
description:
Created in 48 hours for Geta Jam 7. (https://itch.io/jam/geta-game-jam-7)

Theme: Time is a Curse

How long can you survive? Dodge and fight monsters to stay alive. Out of mana? Create a time portal! Enter the portal to freeze time and collect mana potions. Be careful though! While in the time portal, your health with deplete rapidly. 

Made by Chris Creighton and Michael Ha

Pixel art created by Elthen. https://elthen.itch.io/

Music by:

Benjamin Tissot - https://www.bensound.com - Ofelia’s Dream

Black Ant - http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Black_Ant/ - Dark Slide

Sound FX by: 

Open Game Art - https://opengameart.org/

Kenney - https://opengameart.org/content/ui-sound-effects-pack
